{{image.label}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-carousel', templateUrl: './carousel.component.html', styleUrls: ['./carousel.component.scss'] }) export class CarouselComponent { images = [ {id: 1, label: 'Spaghetti al pomodoro'}, {id: 2, label: 'Tagliata di manzo'}, {id: 3, label: 'Tiramisù'}, ]; percorso = "../assets/images/carousel-"; }
